column4: hi, if I upgrade from 9.04 with ext3 file system to 9.10, will the file system change to ext4?
nobody knows what you're talking about. details!
best performance comes from ext4 filesystems created from nothing - ext3 upgraded to ext4 is 2nd best
faster boot is a product of both using ext4 (which, even in jaunty, made a big difference) and using upstart (new in karmic)
